mapper.insert: /* kr.go.bai.eip.bad.fre.dao.BADFRE615Mapper.insertTbcsptsm002L */ INSERT INTO TBCSPTSM002L ( NTT_ID, BBS_ID, NTT_SJ, NTT_CN, SORT_ORDR, NTCR_ID, NTCR_NM, PASSWORD, RDCNT, NTCE_BGNDE, NTCE_ENDDE, ANSWER_AT, PARNTSCTT_NO, NTT_NO, ANSWER_LC, DOC_ID, FRST_REGISTER_ID, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, USE_AT, KEYWORD, MAIN_IMG_ID, QNA_STATE, QNA_ANSWER, DOC_YEAR, HTML_YN, LIST_IMG_ID, PUBLIC_YN, NOTICE_YN, SECRET_YN, URL_LINK, CATEGORY, THUMB_IMG_ID, LIST_TOP_IMG_YN, FAQ_DSJ, FAQ_ANSWER, SUB1, SUB2, CATEGORY_SUB, BUSEO, EMAIL, TEL, JUSO, INSTITUTION, DATE_SUB, QNA_ANSWER_NM, QNA_REG_DATE, CNN_CNT1, CNN_CON2, CNN_CON1, CNN_CON3, CLIENT_IP, BOGO_DATE, BIZ_KEY1, BIZ_KEY2, BIZ_KEY3 ) VALUES ( #{nttId},'BBSMSTR_100000000013',#{titNm},#{isuTxt},0 ,#{frtUsrId},#{usrNam},'',0 ,'','','N' ,#{nttId},1,0,#{docId} ,#{frtUsrId},#{dcsDt},'Y' ,'','','','','','','','Y' ,'N','','',#{jdgReqDvsnCd},'','N','','' ,#{sub1},#{sub2},#{categorySub},'','','','','','','',SYSDATE ,'0','','','','','',#{bizKey1},#{bizKey2},#{bizKey3} )
mapper.select: /* kr.go.bai.eip.bad.fre.dao.BADFRE615Mapper.sendHomepageselectByBiz */ SELECT NTT_ID, BBS_ID, NTT_NO, NTT_SJ, NTT_CN, ANSWER_AT, PARNTSCTT_NO, ANSWER_LC, SORT_ORDR, RDCNT, USE_AT, NTCE_BGNDE, NTCE_ENDDE, NTCR_ID, NTCR_NM, PASSWORD, DOC_ID, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID, THUMB_IMG_ID, CATEGORY, HEADER, KEYWORD, MAIN_IMG_ID, QNA_STATE, QNA_ANSWER, DOC_YEAR, HTML_YN, LIST_IMG_ID, PUBLIC_YN, NOTICE_YN, SECRET_YN, URL_LINK, LIST_TOP_IMG_YN, MAIN_YN, FAQ_ANSWER, FAQ_DSJ, SUB1, SUB2, CATEGORY_SUB, BUSEO, EMAIL, TEL, JUSO, INSTITUTION, DATE_SUB, CNN_STATE1, CNN_STATE2, CNN_STATE3, CNN_STATE4, CNN_CON1, CNN_CON2, CNN_CON3, CNN_CON4, CNN_CNT1, QNA_ANSWER_NM, QNA_REG_DATE, PARENT_NO, LEVEL_NO, CNN_ACCT_DATE, CNN_PROP_DATE, CLIENT_IP, BOGO_DATE, #{flag} AS FLAG FROM TBCSPTSM002L WHERE NTT_ID = #{nttId}

/* kr.go.bai.eip.bad.fre.dao.BADFRE615Mapper.sendGongGamByBiz */ SELECT #{maxSrno} AS MAX_SRNO ,#{dataHndlDvsnCd} AS DATA_HNDL_DVSN_CD ,A.ACP_YR ,A.ACP_DVSN_CD ,DECODE(A.ACP_DVSN_CD, '1', '심사', '재심의') AS ACP_DVSN_NM ,A.ACP_SRNO ,A.ACP_DT ,A.ORG_CD ,A.ORG_NM ,A.DSP_OFC_ACP_DT ,A.REQR_NM ,A.AGT_NM ,A.JDG_REQ_DVSN_CD ,F_CODE_NM('1000043', A.JDG_REQ_DVSN_CD) AS JDG_REQ_DVSN_NM ,A.TIT_NM ,A.ISU_TXT ,A.AMIT_AM ,A.RMK ,A.VT_KND_CD ,F_CODE_NM('1000045', A.VT_KND_CD) AS VT_KND_NM ,A.DCS_SBJ ,B.LWS_YO ,B.EXEC_PRCS_ORG_CD ,#{fnlDealDptCd} AS FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD ,#{fnlMnuId} AS FNL_MNU_ID ,#{frtUsrId} AS FRT_USR_ID ,#{fnlUsrId} AS FNL_USR_ID FROM TBBADFRE012M A ,TBBADFRE013D B WHERE 1=1 AND A.ACP_YR = B.ACP_YR AND A.ACP_DVSN_CD = B.ACP_DVSN_CD AND A.ACP_SRNO = B.ACP_SRNO AND A.ACP_YR = #{acpYr} AND A.ACP_DVSN_CD = #{acpDvsnCd} AND A.ACP_SRNO = #{acpSrno}
